Israel is basically saying that they will expel Arafat soon. 
 
 What are opinions on this?
 
 I think it's a great thing. Arafat is only hurting the effort. He is funding terror directly, and blocking the Prime Minister from doing anything. He doesn't want the militants disarmed.
 
 If they expel Arafat and keep him out, I think we'll see big gains in the peace process.
